title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s NFL 1st Round Draft Reaction, AJ Brown Trade
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s NFL 1st Round Draft Reaction, AJ Brown Trade
description:
Colin reacts to the 1st round of the NFL Draft, including why Aaron Rodgers can’t be thrilled with Green Bay’s two picks, why he liked the Ravens selections, the Eagles trading for AJ Brown from the Titans, his take on the Jets moves, which other bad team he thought had a good night, if he likes the Steelers taking Pitt QB Kenny Pickett, and which teams picks have boom or bust potential.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
